title: Clairo Shares New “Terrapin” Music Video Starring “Weird Al” Yankovic: Watch
description: Ayo Edebiri directed the retro-kitsch clip for the Charm track
author: Walden Green
excerpt: Ayo Edebiri directed the retro-kitsch clip for the Charm track
text: Clairo has shared a music video for “Terrapin,” from her 2024 album Charm. Directed by Ayo Edebiri, the retro-kitsch clip stars a besuited “Weird Al” Yankovic in the role of Clairo, with the actual Clairo hanging out in the background. Watch it below.The Charm tracks “Juno” and “Sexy to Someone” also received videos last year. Clairo was recently nominated for Best Alternative Music Album at the 2025 Grammy Awards, but lost out to St. Vincent. Edebiri has a cameo in the short for Tyler, the Creator’s Chromakopia single “Noid.”Read about Charm at #21 on “The 50 Best Albums of 2024.”
html:
Clairo has shared a music video for “Terrapin,” from her 2024 album Charm. Directed by Ayo Edebiri, the retro-kitsch clip stars a besuited “Weird Al” Yankovic in the role of Clairo, with the actual Clairo hanging out in the background. Watch it below.

The Charm tracks “Juno” and “Sexy to Someone” also received videos last year. Clairo was recently nominated for Best Alternative Music Album at the 2025 Grammy Awards, but lost out to St. Vincent. Edebiri has a cameo in the short for Tyler, the Creator’s Chromakopia single “Noid.”

Read about Charm at #21 on “The 50 Best Albums of 2024.”
